Resource-demanding peripherals such as storage drives can be connected to the USB 3.2 Gen 2 and Gen 2x2 ports to quickly transfer data with enhanced speeds. USB 2.0 ports are also available for lower-powered devices such as mice and keyboards. Wireless peripherals such as headphones and controllers can be connected thanks to integrated Bluetooth 5.3 technology. This motherboard is compatible with both Windows 10 and Windows 11 (64-Bit).

Enhanced Power Design

14th Gen Motherboard is designed for gamers and enthusiasts, with a 12+1+1 dual rail power system and 8+8 pin power connectors to support the Core Boost technology, which boosts the performance of your multi-core Intel processor. Overclock your CPU with ease thanks to MSI Game Boost technology, which allows for 1-second rapid overclocking. The Digital Power Design, Overvoltage Protection, Load-Line Calibration, Double Power Connectors, and Supplemental PCIe Power Connectors on the motherboard all work together to provide proper electrical management through your system to stabilize your system, especially under high loads.

Premium Thermal Solution

This motherboard's increased cooling capabilities will keep your components working at optimal temperatures. The MSI PCI Express Steel Armor slot is soldered to the motherboard to handle the weight of large graphics cards and avoid GPU droop, which can damage PCIe slots. The grounding layer around the mounting holes is doubled for double ESD protection, preventing static discharge spikes from damaging the motherboard.

7.1-Channel USB High-Performance Audio

The MSI MAG B760 TOMAHAWK WIFI Motherboard includes the Realtek ALC897 Codec as well as 7.1-Channel USB High-Performance Audio. Immerse yourself in your favorite media with Audio Boost technology, which includes high-quality audio capacitors, 3.5mm audio connectors with S/SPDIF, and a dedicated high-definition audio processor. The printed circuit board isolates audio layers for clear left and right channels, as well as isolating audio circuits to reduce crossover talk and electrical interference. To protect your ears, de-pop protection eliminates the popping sound caused by plugging or unplugging audio devices.

Lightning Fast Connectivity

Connect to your network wirelessly using Wi-Fi 6 (802.11ax) technology, which provides faster wireless rates and efficiency, making it ideal for uploading and downloading large files. This motherboard also has a 2.5 Gigabit Ethernet connection for wired networking. full_description:
MSI PRO Z790-A WIFI DDR5 ATX Motherboard

The MSI PRO Z790-A WIFI DDR5 ATX Motherboard supports LGA 1700 CPUs from the 12th/13th generation Intel Core, Pentium Gold, and Celeron families. This 14th Gen motherboard, which uses the Intel Z790 chipset and the LGA 1700 socket, has four DDR5 RAM slots that allow twin-channel memory and speeds up to 6800 MHz when overclocked. Six SATA III connections and four M.2 interfaces give abundant storage space and enable RAID 0, 1, 5, and 10 through SATA or 0, 1, and 5 via M.2. The MSI PRO Z790-A WIFI DDR5 13th Gen ATX Motherboard comes with a 03-year warranty.
